allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: MVP with 3 interactive concept playgrounds

Discrete math learning site built with Astro + React islands.
Includes graph traversal \(BFS/DFS maze\), growth rates \(Big-O race\),
and hashing collisions \(pigeonhole\) interactives, plus shared engine
\(animation controller, progress tracking, dark mode\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Subsets interactive â€” concept #4 "Subset Dungeon"

Toggle emoji elements to build a set and watch all 2^n subsets appear in
a dot-grid. Includes animated counter, C\(n,k\) size distribution chart
with click-to-filter, sampling for n>10, and 4 progress milestones.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
